title: Express Templates
description: Project scaffolding templates for Express.js applications. Choose a base template and enhance with add-ons.

categoryFiles.title: Base Templates
categoryFiles.description: Framework starters that define the core project structure

examples.title: REST API with Drizzle
examples.command: hanma create my-api --framework express-rest-api --database drizzle-postgres --pm pnpm

examples.title: Full Stack Production
examples.command: hanma create my-api --framework express-rest-api --database drizzle-postgres --auth jwt-auth --mailer resend --upload s3 --preset security-strict --pm pnpm

examples.title: GraphQL API
examples.command: hanma create my-api --framework express-graphql --database prisma-postgres --pm pnpm
